function ERI_EP05_06()
    --.承-2【1月第3週】「現夢」
    SaveData.Title = "現夢"

    --//BG：校舎前（ぼやけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011ca")

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//BG：1F廊下（ぼやけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ I kept chasing after Marika-neesan. Before I knew it, I was surrounded by familiar scenery, emerging from the darkness. ]])

    MSG([[ My vision was blurry and unclear, but still, I knew. ]])

    MSG([[ This is Yuriai Private Academy, a place I never thought I'd come back to. The place where I kept lying. Now, it's a place I've lost. ]])

    MSG([[ My chest tightened painfully, and I quickened my pace. I wanted to leave here immediately. Together with Marika-neesan. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0803.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "Marika-neesan... where are you going? Wait, there are so many things I want to talk about." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0804.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "There’s so much I want to tell you, and so many apologies..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0028.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika?】
 "I don’t want to hear it." ]])
    --//アルメリア

    MSG([[ For the first time, the shadow walking ahead replied. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0029.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika?】
 "Why do you keep thinking about someone who’s not here? You have so many people around you now, don’t you?" ]])
    --//アルメリア

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0030.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika?】
 "You’ve always been like that. Single-minded, reckless, and dangerous — someone I couldn’t leave alone." ]])
    --//アルメリア

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0031.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika?】
 "That’s why I stayed by your side all along. I cared for you more than anyone else." ]])
    --//アルメリア

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0032.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika?】
 "If you were there next to me... that was all I needed." ]])
    --//アルメリア

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0805.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】焦り・病院服
 "Marika, Neesan...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ A bad feeling surged through me as I quickened my steps to catch up to Marika-neesan. But no matter how fast I went, the distance wouldn’t close. ]])

    MSG([[ Marika-neesan kept climbing the stairs, indifferent to me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005",1000,false)

    --//BG：2F廊下（ぼやけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013cb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000,false)

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0033.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika?】
 "Things are different now, right? You have many allies. Even without me, you can move forward, can’t you?" ]])
    -- //アルメリア

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005",1000,false)

    --//BG：3F廊下（ぼやけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013cc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000,false)

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0034.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika?】
 "You have to graduate from me now, Mina-chan. You’re okay now. I’m sure you can move forward on your own and get help when you need it." ]])
    --//アルメリア

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0806.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】驚き・病院服
 "W-what are you saying...? Don’t say goodbye like that." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ I staggered but ran. My feet tangled, but I dashed forward. ]])

    MSG([[ If I couldn’t catch up, I felt like I’d never see her again, so I moved my legs with all my might. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005",1000,false)

    --//BG：4F廊下（ぼやけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013cd")
    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000)

    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    --//BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ The shadow disappeared up the stairs to the rooftop. I, panting, followed and sprinted up the stairs. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0807.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "Don’t go! Don’t leave me alone!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0035.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika?】
 "…You’re not alone. Stop and look around." ]])
    --//アルメリア

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0036.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika?】
 "You are so — deeply loved." ]])
    --//アルメリア

    MSG([[ I stepped onto the rooftop from where the voice came. ]])
    --//BG：屋上（夜・ぼやけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0808.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】真剣・病院服
 "Marika-neesan!!!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ But no one was there. Darkness stretched over the rooftop, and all I could see was the fence surrounding it. ]])

    MSG([[ I looked everywhere, but Marika-neesan was nowhere to be seen. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0809.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "Marika... Neesan..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0810.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "Ha ha, haha... Even Marika-neesan has abandoned me..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ What did Neesan want to tell me? ]])

    MSG([[ I don't know. I can’t even imagine. Looking back, all I ever did was chase after her back; I never tried to understand what she was thinking. ]])

    MSG([[ There's no way I could understand what Marika-neesan was thinking now. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0811.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "What do you mean by wanting to protect Marika-neesan?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0812.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "I couldn’t protect her because I didn’t even understand her feelings." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Only one thing is clear. Not having your true feelings understood is a huge burden on the heart. ]])

    MSG([[ Like me, who kept playing the role of the ideal “beautiful girl,” Marika-neesan must have sought someone who understood her. ]])

    MSG([[ Just as Daria-san’s betrayal led me to be saved by Akira, When Marika-neesan was cornered, if there had been even one person who understood her feelings, it would’ve been a great support. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0813.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "Ah... I get it now." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I realized my greatest mistake. ]])

    MSG([[ More than learning arrest techniques and getting stronger. ]])

    MSG([[ More than studying hard and going to the same academy. ]])

    MSG([[ Above all else, I should have paid attention to Marika-neesan’s feelings. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0814.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "The one who was pressing Marika-neesan the most... was me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Ironically, perhaps becoming lonely like her for the first time brought me closer to Neesan. ]])

    MSG([[ Only after everything became too late, finally— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0815.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "Where did you go, Neesan... At least, just once more, at the very end..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I searched for Neesan’s shadow with a foggy mind. She’s there. She’s still somewhere. She definitely is. I don’t want her not to be. ]])

    MSG([[ Living without even being able to apologize to Marika-neesan is unbearable. ]])

    MSG([[ At this rate, I, I— ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Minato—" ]])
    --//オウガ

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0816.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "—Neesan...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I felt like someone called me and looked back. Beyond the fence where I looked, a white light flickered. ]])

    MSG([[ —It must be Marika-neesan! ]])

    --//SE：フェンスにぶつかる音（ガシャン！）
PLAY_SE("SEb022.wav")
WAIT(200)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG017ce")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,950,-200)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",500,false)

    MSG([[ Convinced it was her, I clung to the fence and began climbing up. ]])

    MSG([[ With trembling hands, I desperately climbed and climbed over the fence. ]])

    MSG([[ But— ]])

    --//BG：夜空
    --吉　黒で代用
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    --//SE：風の音
PLAY_SE("SEd005.wav")
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ All that extended beyond was just the night. There was no sign or shadow resembling Marika-neesan. ]])
STOP_SE("SEd005.wav",1000)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0291.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Minato—" ]])
    --//オウガ

    MSG([[ I heard the voice again. I landed beyond the fence and looked around from the brink of falling, but I saw nothing. ]])

    MSG([[ Marika-neesan wouldn’t show herself to me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0817.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "Where are you...? Hey, please come out, Marika-neesan." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    --//SE：風の音
PLAY_SE("SEd006.wav")
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ A cold wind blew across the rooftop. On the unstable footing, my body swayed greatly. ]])
    --//SE：フェンスの揺れる音（ガシャガシャ）
PLAY_SE("SEb022.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ My fingers wrapped around the fence were about to snap but held all my weight. ]])

    MSG([[ This is the rooftop of a four-story school building. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s easily about fifteen meters high. If I fell, I definitely wouldn’t survive. ]])

    MSG([[ My life now depends on just three fingers. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0818.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "Ah, ..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Looking down at the dark ground below, the white light flickered. It seemed to be beckoning me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0819.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】驚く・病院服
 "Marika-neesan... are you there...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ As I stared at that shadow, the thread of something stretched tight inside me snapped one by one. ]])

    MSG([[ At the same time, the fingers tangled on the fence slowly slipped away. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0820.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】泣き笑い・病院服
 "Yeah, right. You hate being alone, don’t you, Marika-neesan?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0821.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】泣き笑い・病院服
 "It’s okay... I won’t ever make you feel lonely again." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ All fingers slid off the fence. My body was carried by the wind, sucked into the darkness backward. ]])

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    --//SE：風の音
PLAY_SE("SEd005.wav")
WAIT(1000)
    --//CG：アキラとの添い寝
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048aa")
    LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,105,105)
    LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,100,100,3000,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 2000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0822.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】驚き・病院服
 "Aki, ra" ]])

STOP_SE("SEd005.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    --//SE：フェンスにぶつかる音（ガシャン！）
PLAY_SE("SEb022.wav")
WAIT(400)

    MSG([[ I instinctively reached out toward the fence. ]])

    --//CG：ミナトの腕を掴むアキラ（背景・ミナトの手のみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV025aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask032" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ My fingers caught the gap between the fence and the ground, leaving me dangling at the edge of the rooftop. ]])

    MSG([[ It hurts like my fingers are being torn. The palms of my hands hurt too, as if the skin was scraped by friction, a dull aching spreading. ]])

    MSG([[ But thanks to the intense pain, the haze that covered my mind cleared all at once. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0823.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "What... am I..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Thinking comes later. For now, I have to think about climbing back up to the rooftop. ]])

    MSG([[ I put my other hand and foot on the ledge and struggled to climb. But it didn’t work. ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn’t find anywhere to catch my foot, so I had to pull myself up with just my arm strength, but I had no strength at all. ]])

    MSG([[ Supporting my weight was all I could manage, and I felt like I’d fall any second. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0824.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "If this keeps up..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    --//CI：アキラBU（泣き顔）切り抜き 103

    MSG([[ I’d leave Akira alone. I promised to always be by her side, but I’d make her cry again. ]])

    MSG([[ That’s the one thing I can’t allow. No matter what happens, absolutely not. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0825.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】真剣・病院服
 "...I’ll go back." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0826.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】真剣・病院服
 "I’ll definitely go back to Akira!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I mustered my remaining strength and stretched out my arm. My fingers caught on the fence at the edge of the ledge. ]])

    MSG([[ All that’s left is to climb up. ]])

    MSG([[ Just climb up. ]])

    MSG([[ Just climb up, but— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0827.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "...I can’t." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I couldn’t climb up no matter what, and my strength ran out. ]])

    MSG([[ Alone on the rooftop of the school in the dead of night. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how much I struggle, there’s no way to save myself. ]])

    MSG([[ Truly, this time, it’s the end of the story. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    --//CG：女装したミナト
    LAYER_LOAD(10, "EV003aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(10,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(10,255,1000,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(10,103,103,2000,Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(1000)

    --//CG：スカートが破れた！
    LAYER_LOAD(11, "EV008aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(11,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(11,255,1000,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(11,103,103,2000,Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(1000)

    --//CG：コスプレ店員エリカ
    LAYER_LOAD(12, "EV013aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(12,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(12,255,1000,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(12,103,103,2000,Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(1000)

    --//CG：アキラとの添い寝
    LAYER_LOAD(13, "EV048aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(13,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(13,255,1000,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(13,110,110,30000,Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(1000)


    MSG([[ Only memories with Akira flashed through my mind. Though my life had many regrets, the time I spent with Akira was when I was most honest and truly happy. ]])

    MSG([[ At least, I want to see Akira’s smile one last time. That impossible wish welled up inside my heart. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m always too late to realize things. Too late. To realize just how important Akira is to me, only now. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(14,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(14,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(14,128,30000,Ease.Liner)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0828.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ・病院服
 "I’m sorry... Akira." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My feelings never reach her. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(10,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(11,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(12,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(13,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(14,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ The fingers caught on the fence slipped off smoothly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0714.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Minachin!!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ But just before I fell—someone grabbed my arm.]])
    --　　　　◆
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    --WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP05_07")
end
